name: Seung-Hwan Baek
content: HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationPOSTECH Computational Imaging Group is a dynamic research team dedicated to developing next-generation visual-computing systems and methods—spanning cameras, displays, robots, nano-materials, and computing devices. The group operates as part of POSTECH Computer Graphics Lab. Recent newsOne Transactions on Computational Imaging paper acceptedSeung-Hwan promoted to Associate professor.Eunsue and Suhyun received NRF fellowship!One SIGGRAPH Asia paper accepted!Seung-Hwan received Asiagraphics Young Researcher Award!One ICCV paper acceptedOne Nature Communications paper acceptedEunsue received POSTECHIAN awardSeung-Hwan received POSTECH CSE Young Scholar AwardSeven CVPR papers acceptedShow all newsLaboratoryStudent officeAcknowledgementsWe are grateful to the National Research Foundation of Korea, Ministry of Science and ICT, Institute for Information & communication Technology Planning & evaluation, Samsung, POSCO, ETRI, KETI, KEIT, Meta, Micropix, for generous support of our research.Address: POSTECH Institute of Artificial Intelligence (PIAI), POSTECH 77, Cheongam-Ro, Nam Gu, Pohang, Gyungbuk-do, Korea (37673)TEL: +82-54-279-2908E-mail: shwbaek@postech.ac.krPersonal information policy rule of POSTECHCopyright (c) 2025.
